name: Rainbow Repo
description:
Rainbow Repo is a top down shoot em up by Bacon Studio 

When the door of light splits, It's up to the repair tanks to fix it before the universe implodes! Play alone or gather your friends for this exciting new Shooter game! 

Pair weapons and items with different elements to make the most out of your attacks in this crazy co-op frenzy! 

Rainbow Repo is all about coordination and timing! You may be loaded with a heavy artillery but your cannon is always turning! Move around hectically to position yourself for combat! 

Play alone or together in Single-player, Co-op, or PvP mode! 

Rainbow Repo is set to be released for the Nintendo Switch by early 2021 if not late 2020 provided everything goes according to plan in terms of investments.

Overall game features and scope (Including controller mapping for Joy-Con and player configurations)

Single-Player, Co-op, Local Pvp. 

Switch Motion controls will be used.

co-op/pvp modes will support undocked playing

How will our title will utilize Nintendo Switch features? (multiplayer/play on the go/docked or undocked/HD rumble) 

- Shake controller to create bigger attacks.

- Screenshake will cause controller rumble.

- Multiplayer with multiple joy-cons.
